definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

sentences.english: This type of shopping gives a man a brain haemorrhage within 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 這種逛街方式能在二十分鐘內令男人的大腦充血。

sentences.english: Most men get a brain haemorrhage after 20 minutes of shopping.
sentences.chinese: 大多數男人在逛街二十分鐘後會腦充血。
